title: Basil considering Exit from Parliament, says Senior SLPP official
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st): A senior official of the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna said that Basil Rajapaksa is considering to step down as a National List MP.
The Senior SLPP official told News 1st that Basil Rajapaksa will announce his decision on Thursday (9).
He also added that Basil Rajapaksa wishes to engage in party activities in a fully time capacity after he exits Parliament.
Further, Basil Rajapaksa has called for a special press conference on Thursday (9).
